Package com.ffeichta.Compressor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileDrop.Listener
    Implement this inner interface to listen for when files are dropped.
    FileDrop.TransferableObject.Fetcher
    Instead of passing your data directly to the FileDrop.TransferableObject constructor, you may want to know exactly when your data was received in case you need to remove it from its source (or do anyting else to it).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompressAndSaveThread
    Thread who compress an saves a image and if needs than creates new directories
    CompressAndShowThread
    Thread who compress an image and shows it in the imageComponent
    CompressButtonDialog
    Shows the Frame when the button "Compress" is clicked
    CompressDialogChangeListener
    Listener that updates a label when values from Spinner or Slider change
    CompressorException
    This class is used to handle exceptions.
    DialogProgressBar
    Dialog shows the progressBar while images are compressed and saved
    FileDrop
    This class makes it easy to drag and drop files from the operating system to a Java program.
    FileDrop.Event
    This is the event that is passed to the filesDropped(...) method in your FileDropListener when files are dropped onto a registered drop target.
    FileDrop.TransferableObject
    At last an easy way to encapsulate your custom objects for dragging and dropping in your Java programs!
    ImageComponent
    Shows an image in a JComponent.
    InfoBox
    Class that shows information about the application in a Frame
    JPGCompressorGUI
    Creates the GUI of the application and the ActionListener
    JPGImageCompress
    Class that can compress an jpg-image
    Main
    Class which contains the main() method for the application
    PlayThread
    Thread who compress an image and saves the result in a BufferedImage
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CompressButtonDialog.Options
